scripts.build:standard: browserify src/app.js > out/standard.js && create-html -s standard.js -t browser-pack > out/standard.html
scripts.build:flat: browserify -p ../plugin src/app.js > out/flat.js && create-html -s flat.js -t browser-pack-flat > out/flat.html
scripts.build: npm run build:standard && npm run build:flat
